prompts: Create a legendary Pokemon that embodies strength and has a powerful presence.
I want a rock-type Pokemon with a robust build and impressive horns.
Generate an image of a majestic Pokemon that commands respect in battle.
Make a quadruped Pokemon with a unique combination of colors and fierce features.
Imagine a Pokemon that roams mountainous terrains, showcasing its durability and might.
Design a mythical creature that blends rock and fighting elements perfectly.
Show me a Pokemon that stands as a guardian of nature, with distinct earthy tones.
